markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Malyass Root Paste](/Equipment.aspx?ID=122)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Contact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=37" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 552 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 55 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Three Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Malyass root paste sees use to impede opponents in athletic competitions, in addition to espionage and tracking.

**Saving Throw** DC 26 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 minute; **Maximum Duration** 6 minutes; **Stage 1** [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) and –10-foot status penalty to all Speeds (1 minute); **Stage 2** clumsy 2 and –20-foot status penalty to all Speeds (1 minute); **Stage 3** clumsy 3, [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16), and –30-foot status penalty to all Speeds

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Malyass Root Paste
